message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement at a price of $950000. I look forward to your response.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I must respectfully decline. I am unable to lower the price below $950000 due to the value and cost associated with this product. I hope we can find a way to move forward towards a mutually beneficial agreement.
